resources.string: Open-source application for tracking Wi-Fi and Cell networks. You can disable these tips in settings.
This button hides many options to customize your experience
You can find statistics on the left
You can find activities on the right
If you click or drag this surface upwards, it will bring up the map
Type in this area to search. Tapping on the magnifying glass on the right triggers the search, or you can use your keyboards search button, if it has one.
Tapping on this button moves you to your location. Map will follow your location until you move the map manually. Tapping on it again while following shows you the direction you are facing.
If you are signed in and have access to the map, you can pull this up to change maps overlay layer.
Long press on a date and drag to select date range
